caption.p: The outgrowth of HIV CTL escape mutants through time. Data sets from three different patients (reviewed in [ 19]) are shown as red, brown, and yellow symbols. Equation 5.12 is fitted to these data, yielding rates of outgrowth, c−(a − â), of 0.048 ( red), 0.012 ( brown), and 0.006 ( yellow)
